messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: due to your defunct ai we had to BSA all your supermatter equipment after the AI tried to delemate it

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: we will send you a sm crate free of charge

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: we also destroyed the ai already so it's fine

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: we sent you another crystal directly to the engine you might want to stop the delemation though

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: what did we do

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: blame the ai

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: okay we destroyed your sm again this is getting very costly so we sent you a hugbox sm

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Greetings, This is the famous Wrestling Federation, We have sent over one of our best wrestlers in this station, If one of you beats him on a 1v1, We will send you something neat.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: He is currently awaiting a challenge in the Bar.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Last chance at our amazing prize, If you beat the Eradicator, You will win our grand prize, And more importantly, You will show the strength of your station.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Round 1 is over, The Eradicator has been smashed and crushed, His bones show grave signs of severe bruising, Round 1 goes to Space Station 13. Round 2 will begin soon.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Round 2 is over, Silent has been dominated, His face slapped silly and showing severe and fatal signs of bone rupture and organ rips, The final round, Round 3, Will begin shortly after the break.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Power Systems Nominal

Power has been restored to Plasma Lab XXVI. We apologize for the inconvenience.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Power Systems Nominal

All SMESs on Plasma Lab XXVI have been recharged. We apologize for the inconvenience.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Your station has fought valiantly, But since 3rd round was interrupted, We shall give you another round, A tag team round, Win this, and you get the amazing grand prize.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: i guess you win that reward

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: The reward is, You can keep his sexy khaki's and his 1000 cookie prize

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Security Alert

Gr3y.T1d3 virus detected in Plasma Lab XXVI door subroutines. Severity level of 3. Recommend station AI involvement.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Gabrielle Clarke is your new HoP.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Look's like someone forgot to log out.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: "i suck peepee" -NICK FREEMAN

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: "hail hitler" -Nick Freeman (this isn't even a joke)

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: "CMO COME TO BRIDGE IMMEDIATELY" -Nick Freeman

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Unstable bluespace anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Labor Shuttle Dock.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Massive bluespace translocation detected.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.
